description: This file defines the DashboardScreen widget for a Flutter app's feature, displaying device metrics and boost functionality, and includes helper widgets for UI components.

classes.name: DashboardScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays device metrics and a boost button, pulling data from AppState.

classes.name: _BoostHero
classes.description: A stateless widget that offers a styled button to trigger the boost functionality.

classes.name: _MetricCard
classes.description: A styled card widget displaying a specific device metric with an icon, title, and value.

methods.name: _formatLastBoost
methods.description: Formats the last boost time into a human-readable string, returning 'Never' if null.
